title: World Canals
description: Famous canals and waterways around the world

questions.question: The Suez Canal connects the Mediterranean Sea to which other body of water?
In which year did the Panama Canal officially open to commercial traffic?
The Erie Canal, completed in 1825, connected the Hudson River to which of the Great Lakes?
Which European city is famous for its extensive canal system and is sometimes called 'The Venice of the North'?
The Grand Canal of China, the world's longest artificial waterway, stretches approximately how far?
Which French engineer initially led the failed attempt to build a sea-level canal in Panama?
The Kiel Canal connects the North Sea to which other sea, allowing ships to avoid sailing around Denmark?
The Corinth Canal cuts through a narrow strip of land in which country?
Which U.S. president is most closely associated with the construction of the Panama Canal?
The Manchester Ship Canal, opened in 1894, allowed ocean-going ships to reach which English city?
How does the Panama Canal move ships between the Atlantic and Pacific oceans?
The Welland Canal allows ships to bypass which famous natural landmark between Lakes Erie and Ontario?
In which country would you find the GÃ¶ta Canal, connecting the east and west coasts?
The Suez Canal was nationalized in 1956 by which Egyptian leader, triggering an international crisis?
The Canal du Midi, a 17th-century engineering marvel in southern France, connects the Garonne River to which sea?
